titleStmt.title: Robin conscience, or, Conscionable Robin his progresse through court, city and countrey: with his bad [en]tertainment at each severall place, &[c.]
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Martin Parker by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: cropped, title page torn, with loss of text and imprint.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
